entity.name: intra_page_connector
entity.description: An intra_page_connector is a page_connector that is a Intra_page_connector (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: off_page_connector
entity.description: An off_page_connector is a page_connector that is a Off_page_connector (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: on_page_connector
entity.description: An on_page_connector is a page_connector that is a On_page_connector (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: page_connector
entity.description: A page_connector is a schematic_element_definition that is a Page_connector (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: schematic_drawing
entity.description: A schematic_drawing is a schematic_element_definition and a drawing_sheet_revision.

entity.name: reference_between_page_connectors
entity.description: A reference_between_page_connectors is a representation_relationship that is a Reference_between_page_connectors (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: rep_1
explicit.description: the Page_connector that references, or is referenced by, rep_2.

explicit.name: rep_2
explicit.description: the Page_connector that references, or is referenced by, rep_1.
